root: ^Good! Can we talk for a bit?
^Is there something you want to talk about?
^Not necessarily. I just want to spend time with you.
^So I was thinking about when we first met, and I kinda messed up your studio.
^I'm glad it's fine. But I was too busy trying not to die that I wasn't really paying attention to what you were doing. Do you make music?
^It's one of few pleasant escapes, yes.
^That's awesome! What sort of music do you make?
^Well, it's all mostly loud and energetic.
^You? Loud and energetic? I can't see it.
^I suppose that's why I enjoy it so much. I let my music carry my voice when I'd rather not speak.
^Huh, interesting. I'll have to listen to some of it.
^Wait! Do you want to come to one of my concerts!?
^Well, no. I mean do you want to come to one of the concerts I go to? My favorite band is playing?

s: ^It might be too loud for me.

IWOULDLOVETOGO: ^Well, I don't really make a habit of listening to music. But if you like it then it must be good. So yes, I'd like to go to a concert with you!
^You'll have so much fun. I can tell you everything about the band!
ITMIGHTBETOOLOUDFORME: ^It sounds like fun, but I'm not one for loud noises.
^But I'd still love to listen to your stuff! Maybe you can show me some of this bands music outside of the concert where it's quieter.
